• Influencer: Nathan King
            • Brand: Pillow Talk
            • Fee: ~$13,065
            • Deliverables: 2 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x 90-second product demo, 1 x Pinterest pin, 1 x Twitter post

            • Engagement: 4 months
            • Usage: 10 months
            • Start: November 2025
